description: List business units with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Results are limited to business units whose broker is within the user policy scope.
validation_notes: --broker and --parent accept comma-separated ID lists. --with-children and --without-children require strict boolean values (true/false).

flags.name: --broker
flags.description: Filter by broker ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --parent
flags.description: Filter by parent business unit ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of business unit IDs.

flags.name: --with-children
flags.description: Filter by whether unit has children (true/false)

flags.name: --without-children
flags.description: Filter by whether unit has no children (true/false)
